patthana12.3:1.1: Nahetuṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana12.3:2.1: Nahetuṃ nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha pañca. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana12.3:3.1: Nahetuṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṃ naanāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana12.3:4.1: Nahetuṃ naāsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana12.3:5.1: Nahetuṃ naāsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana12.3:6.1: Nahetuṃ noāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana12.3:7.1: Nahetuṃ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha pañca. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana12.3:8.1: Nahetuṃ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana12.3:9.1: Nahetuṃ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha pañca. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana12.3:10.1: Nahetuṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava.)
